user.title: Yeelight Bluetooth
user.description: Control a Yeelight bluetooth bedside lamp. Select to scan for devices or enter the mac Address manually.

scan.title: Yeelight Bluetooth
scan.description: Make sure the lamp is not connected to other devices or it may not be discoverable (A reset may also help).  Are you ready to start scanning?

device.title: Yeelight Bluetooth
device.description: Enter a name for the device and the MAC address for the lamp. To finish the pairing step, you may need to push the small button on the lamp if it `pulses`.

error.BTLEDisconnectError: Bluetooth connection error while trying to scan. Make sure nothing else is using bluetooth.
error.BTLEManagementError: Could not start a bluetooth scan. It is very likely some permission errors. Follow directions from github repo.

abort.already_configured: This mac address is already registered.
abort.no_devices_found: No devices found during this scan. Ensure the lamp is not connected to another app. Resetting the lamp may help.
